Hi SREE,

I assume you are using the AutoCompleteBox implementation of the Silverlight Toolkit. You can read about how to create commands with attached behaviors in these links:

  • ICommand for Silverlight with Attached Behaviors
  • C# Code Snippet to Create Commands with Attached Behaviors using Prism

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

But the those are not completly refering to the Prism architecture.Can you please send me the simple example to understand the silverlight wiht Prism,wcf,linq,Entity.you help will be appreciated.I am new to  this silverlight and Prism .
